BadgeDetail.Name: Volunteer
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has volunteered their time to benefit an organisation, group or other person

Task.Title: Volunteer
Task.Body: Upload an account of your volunteering activities. This should include how much time you have volunteered to date, who it was for and the types of activities it included. Your evidence could be in the form of a video, images or a written account. See do it for more information.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload an account of your volunteering activities. This should include how much time you have volunteered to date, who it was for and the types of activities it included. Your evidence could be in the form of a video, images or a written account. See do it for more information.
Task.TextileBody: Upload an account of your volunteering activities. This should include how much time you have volunteered to date, who it was for and the types of activities it included. Your evidence could be in the form of a video, images or a written account. See ["*do it*":https://do-it.org/ !0] for more information.
